```{r packages, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(scater)
library(cowplot)
library(knitr)
```


snATACseq analysis with ArchR - FC cluster QC 1.

*** 


## Results {.tabset}

***

### Cluster QC {.tabset}

#### No Harmony 

Remove clusters that do not have >= 30 cells in at least 2 donors:

+ Cell count before filter = `r FC_Clusters_cell_cnt_pre_filter`
+ Clusters to be retained from initial QC pass  = `r FC_Clusters_clusters_retained'`
+ No. of cells to be removed = `r FC_Clusters_cnts_cells_to_rm`
+ Cell count after filter = `r FC_Clusters_cell_cnt_post_filter`

***

##### Reclustering plots {.tabset}

```{R, Clusters, echo=FALSE, , fig.height = 10, fig.width = 10}
print(FC_group_plot_reclust)
```
